Text:
Np previews !? "legend" here's how to do it. Go to:
http://imgur.com/
And choose 2-4 pics and upload them and just copy the direct link to your description (each link must be on a line by itself, like this) :
http://i.imgur.com/8uYKmGW.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/QyCbKrY.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/Kgkjkcw.jpg

Note: previews are resized. Real size is 3000x2000 pixel.
